meanings.definition: Tending to snatch or grab quickly
meanings.sent1: The cat made a snatchy move to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent2: Her snatchy behavior at the store startled the other customers.
meanings.sent3: The snatchy squirrel quickly grabbed the nut and ran away.
meanings.sent4: His snatchy reflexes saved him from getting hit by the ball.
meanings.sent5: The snatchy thief swiftly took the wallet and disappeared into the crowd.

meanings.definition: Having a jerky or irregular quality
meanings.sent1: The old car had a snatchy ride on the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: The snatchy video playback made it hard to follow the story.
meanings.sent3: The snatchy dance moves made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: The snatchy music rhythm added an interesting twist to the song.
meanings.sent5: The snatchy animation gave the cartoon a unique charm.

meanings.definition: Characterized by sudden or quick movements
meanings.sent1: The snatchy wind blew the leaves off the tree.
meanings.sent2: Her snatchy gestures showed her excitement about the news.
meanings.sent3: The snatchy rabbit darted across the field in a hurry.
meanings.sent4: The snatchy clouds raced across the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The snatchy movements of the dancer captivated the audience.
